template.name: Template Huawei wireless Access Controller (AC)
template.description: Template for Huawei's wireless Access Controller (AC).

item_prototype.name: ap-eth-download[{#APNAME}]
item_prototype.description: This object indicates the dowstream rate of an Ethernet interface. Unit: Kbps

item_prototype.name: ap-eth-upload[{#APNAME}]
item_prototype.description: This object indicates the upstream rate of an Ethernet interface. Unit: Kbps

trigger_prototype.name: AP {#APNAME} State is different from the normal value: STATE={ITEM.LASTVALUE1}
AP {#APNAME} Temperature is above critical threshold: TEMP={ITEM.LASTVALUE1} [>=50]
